  • Constructor Details

    • ServerThread

      public ServerThread​(Socket socket, Server server) throws CertificateException, org.bouncycastle.operator.OperatorCreationException
      Constructs a server thread, setting up the input and output mechanisms. User is also attempted to be added and connection is closed if this fails. Certificates between server and user also exchnaged.
      Throws:
      CertificateException
      org.bouncycastle.operator.OperatorCreationException
